generated.css: .loadingblock{z-index:-1;position:absolute;width:100%;height:100%;background-color:#000;opacity:0;transition:opacity .5s ease-in-out}.loadingblock video:not(#introVideo){max-height:100%;max-width:100%;width:auto;height:auto;position:absolute;top:0;bottom:0;left:0;right:0;margin:auto}.loadingblock.show{opacity:1;transition:opacity .5s ease-in-out}.loadingScreenStart{opacity:0;transition:opacity .5s ease-in-out;width:100%;height:100%;position:absolute;background:url(04f4907486b1ba0418d14f274ead3f3e.png);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-size:cover}.loadingScreenStart.show{opacity:1;transition:opacity 1s ease-in-out}.loadingScreenStart .backbox{position:absolute;width:fit-content;height:fit-content;background-color:#151515;padding:20px;border-radius:8px;top:0;bottom:0;left:0;right:0;margin:auto;text-align:center;align-self:center;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.loadingScreenStart .backbox .logobox{display:inline-block;animation:glitch 1.5s infinite}.loadingScreenStart .backbox .logobox,.loadingScreenStart .backbox .logotext{position:relative;color:#fff;font-size:40px;margin-bottom:18px;font-weight:700;text-align:center}.loadingScreenStart .backbox .welcomtext{font-style:bold;font-size:34px;line-height:100%}.loadingScreenStart .backbox .subtext,.loadingScreenStart .backbox .welcomtext{color:#fff;width:100%;text-align:center;font-weight:800;line-height:20px;margin-bottom:18px}.loadingScreenStart .backbox .subtext{font-size:16px;display:flex;justify-content:center;max-width:700px}.loadingScreenStart .backbox .box_social{display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;text-align:center;font-style:normal;font-weight:300;font-size:24px;line-height:24px;white-space:nowrap;gap:16px;padding-bottom:15px}.loadingScreenStart .backbox .box_social .box_stats{background-color:rgba(28,28,28,.8);padding:8px;border-radius:4px;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;text-align:center;font-style:normal}.loadingScreenStart .backbox .box_social .box_stats span{font-style:normal;font-weight:400;margin-left:8px;line-height:100%;font-weight:800;font-size:14px;line-height:20px;color:#fff}.loadingScreenStart .backbox .box_social .icon{width:26px;height:26.15px}.loadingScreenStart .backbox .button{display:inline-block;padding:15px 50px;background:linear-gradient(45deg,#e3256b,#86102b);border-radius:10px;color:#fff;font-style:normal;font-weight:600;font-size:22px;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;letter-spacing:1px;box-shadow:0 5px 15px rgba(133,10,55,.4);transition:all .3s ease;cursor:pointer;margin-bottom:17px}.loadingScreenStart .backbox .button img{margin-bottom:-10px;width:31px;height:35.15px}.loadingScreenStart .backbox .button:hover{background:linear-gradient(45deg,#86102b,#e3256b);box-shadow:0 8px 25px rgba(133,10,55,.8);transform:scale(1.05)}.loadingScreenStart .backbox .button:active{transform:scale(.98);box-shadow:0 4px 12px rgba(227,37,107,.4)}.loadingScreenStart .backbox .text{color:hsla(0,0%,100%,.63);width:100%;text-align:center;font-style:normal;font-weight:600;font-size:14px;line-height:100%;line-height:24px}@keyframes upper{50%{margin-bottom:5px}}
